roleset.name: to constitute or include
roleset.note: ENCOMPASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encompass' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from encompass.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The engine plant may encompass plans for a joint components venture with Jaguar .
example.arg: plans for a joint components venture with Jaguar
